data.title: Press Release Archives
data.meta_description: December 12, 1977: Stella B. Hackel was sworn in as director of the Bureau of the Mint by Secretary of the Treasury W. Michael Blumenthal.
data.text:
Stella B. Hackel is Sworn In as Director of the Bureau of the Mint

February 16, 2017 - Press Release December 12, 1977 Stella B. Hackel was sworn in today as director of the Bureau of the Mint by Secretary of the Treasury W. Michael Blumenthal. Mrs. Hackel was nominated for the position by President Carter on October...

First Sale of Proof Editions of President Carter’s Miniature Medal

February 15, 2017 - Press Release August 8, 1977 A bronze proof-quality edition of the miniature of President Jimmy Carter’s official Presidential medal will go on sale for the first time at the Mint Exhibit at the American Numismatic Convention, August 23-28, 1977, in...

Mary Brooks Resigns as Director of the Mint

February 15, 2017 - Press Release February 15, 1977 Mrs. Mary Brooks has resigned as Director of the Mint effective February 11, 1977. In a letter to President Carter February 1, Mrs. Brooks said: My dear Mr. President: With this letter I respectfully tender...

Brooks’ Remarks at Commemorative Ceremonies Marking the Restoration of the Old San Francisco Mint

February 15, 2017 - Remarks of Director of the Mint, the Honorable Mary Brooks at Commemorative Ceremonies Marking the Restoration of the Old San Francisco Mint San Francisco, California November 7, 1976 Press Release November 8, 1976 We are here today to pay homage...

2017 America the Beautiful Quarters Silver Proof Set™ Goes On Sale Feb. 16

WASHINGTON – Sales will open for the 2017 United States Mint America the Beautiful Quarters Silver Proof Set (product code 17AQ) on February 16 at noon Eastern Time (ET). The five quarters in this set–all struck in 90 percent silver...

United States Awarded Top Honors for Coin of the Year

Two United States Mint coins recognized for design and artistic vision

United States Mint Launches 36th America the Beautiful Quarters Program Coin

First quarter of 2017 honors Effigy Mounds National Monument in Iowa

Mint Facilities Suspend Coin Production

February 15, 2017 - Press Release February 9, 1977 Deputy Director of the Mint Frank H. MacDonald announced today that, effective February 11, the Denver Mint and the West Point Depository will suspend production of coins for an indefinite period. Coin-making dies used by...

Mint Facilities to Curtail Use of National Gas

February 15, 2017 - Press Release January 28, 1977 Deputy Director of the Mint Frank H. MacDonald announced today that in accordance with requests from the States of Pennsylvania and New York, the U.S. Mint at Philadelphia and the New York Assay Office will...
